translations: n.[数]约束；限制；约束条件（constraint 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 设计约束，设计制约；设计限制；设计约束条件

sentences.sentence: This decision will impose serious constraints on all schools.
sentences.translation: 这项决定将使所有的学校受到各种严格的限制。

sentences.sentence: Their decision to abandon the trip was made because of financial constraints.
sentences.translation: 他们放弃这次旅行的决定是因财务限制而作出的。

sentences.sentence: Our modern workplaces also operate based on outdated time constraints.
sentences.translation: 我们现代的工作场所也是基于过时的时间限制而运作的。
